front.title: Coding and transmission of text in real-time and en-bloc mode based on MSRP

abstract.t: This memo describes conventions for exchange and presentation of textin SIP sessions through the Message Session Relay Protocol MSRP. Itcovers two different methods for taking the initiative to transmit.These methods are timer initiated real-time text and user requesteden-bloc transmission in Messaging. The document gives specificguidance on handling of text presentation and presentation control ofconversational sessions. It specifies how the capability to conductMSRP sessions with real-time text is declared so that sessionnegotiation can make decisions on what transport protocol to use andhow to route the calls to get the desired support for textcommunication.
